ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Whats the arguement?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... during the 3 seconds between when a puller gets in range and the mobs get to you once every 40 minutes or so? the only limiting factor to this song is
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:38 PM 3/1/01 -0500, you wrote:
>Exactly my point, there's always something else to do.

during the 3 seconds between when a puller gets in range and the
mobs get to you once every 40 minutes or so?

the only limiting factor to this song is mana. you don't need it memorized
during the time that you are getting that mana back. blow it off, demem it
and put something else in while you regain mana. from what i have seen on
boards like backstage, it sounds like bards never do any form of crowd control
in a group with an enchanter unless the enchanter dies or is getting beat on
after someone breaks mez or mez gets resisted. so in that case, you are not
playing to your full potential (assuming you aren't gonna charm) if you sit there with
a full mana bar.

it is actually of LESS use to me than most other folks because i usually play with
enchanters who recognize that charm is a huge bonus to party damage and are
good enough enchanters not to get confused when i say ''charming %T''.
